original_text:
Then all who live in Egypt will know that I am the Lord.
“‘You have been a staff of reed for the people of Israel.
korean_text: 애굽의 모든 주민이 내가 여호와인 줄을 알리라 애굽은 본래 이스라엘 족속에게 갈대 지팡이라

sentences.original_text: Then all who live in Egypt
will know that I am the Lord
You have been a staff of reed
